item.title: Ic 2120 (Brussel Midi departure 20.33pm, arrival Arlon 23.28pm): special bus
item.description:
01.02.2015 15:55 - 28.11.2015

Due to failure of the signal box in Troisvierges, a delay of 10-15 minutes is expected on all trains.

item.title: Luxembourg - Sandweiler/Contern - Oetrange: Works from February 16 to December 12
item.description:
16.02.2015 15:33 - 12.12.2015

Due to the works for the track-doubling of the Luxembourg – Sandweiler line and the construction of the new Sandweiler-Contern stop, the train line between Luxembourg and Oetrange will be completely closed from 16 February to 12 December 2015. All the trains Luxembourg - Wasserbillig - Trier, in both directions, are diverted via Syren. The stops of Cents-Hamm and Sandweiler-Contern have only bus service.

item.title: Several trains replaced by busses in Howald, Bettembourg et Hollerich between 12am and 1am
item.description:
06.02.2015 09:36 - 11.12.2015

Due to catenary works, several trains are replaced by busses till december 11.

item.title: Luxembourg - Bettembourg: trains replaced by busses on several nights
item.description:
30.03.2015 10:00 - 21.05.2015

Due to extensive track works in Bettembourg, the train service between Luxembourg and Bettembourg (and vice versa) is replaced by buses on several nights after midnight.

item.title: Railway works - Trains replaced by buses from April 27 to 30 after midnight
item.description:
27.04.2015 - 30.04.2015 01:00

Due to catenary works in Ettelbruck, trains are replaced by buses after midnight.

item.title: Ettelbruck - Diekirch: several trains replaced (from midnight to 1am) by busses from April 20 to 24
item.description:
20.04.2015 20:00 - 24.04.2015

Due to catenary works, the section of the line between Ettelbruck and Diekirch will be closed from April 20 to 24.

item.title: NANCY - METZ - LUXEMBOURG: several TER-trains replaced by special busses from 1st to 30 April (except on week-ends)
item.description:
01.04.2015 11:35 - 30.04.2015

Due to works, several TER-trains are replaced by special busses.

item.title: Ettelbruck – Diekirch and Kautenbach – Wiltz: several trains limited on Fryday, april 24
item.description:
24.04.2015 00:00 - 23:59

As a measuring train will be running between Ettelbruck and Diekirch and between Wiltz and Kautenbach respectively on Friday 24 April, the CFL have to take several measures.

item.title: Esch/Alzette - Audun-le-Tiche: several trains cancelled from February 14 to April 25
item.description:
14.02.2015 16:03 - 25.04.2015

Due to works in the train station of Esch/Alzette, several trains are cancelled ans some timetables are changes.

item.title: Luxembourg - Rodange: changes of rail platforms in Esch/Alzette for several trains from February 14 to April 25
item.description:
14.02.2015 16:46 - 25.04.2015

Due to works, the departures of trains Luxembourg – Rodange are on plateform 2, Rodange – Luxembourg from plateform 3.

item.title: Luxembourg - Dommeldange: trains replaced by buses on April 25 and 26
item.description:
25.04.2015 14:32 - 26.04.2015

Due to the works for the track-doubling of the Pulverm√ºhle viaduct and the construction of the “Pfaffenthal-Kirchberg” stop, the section of the line between Luxembourg and Dommeldange will be completely closed on saturday 25 and sunday 26 April. Trains will be replaced by buses from Luxembourg to Dommeldange and vice versa.

item.title: GERMANY: strike on wednesday 22 an thursday 23 April
item.description:
22.04.2015 02:00 - 23.04.2015 21:00

Due to strike action from the train drivers of DB, a lots of trains are cancelled. The strike starts on wednesday 2am and will end on thursday 9pm. No changes for Luxembourg-Trier and Trier-Luxembourg.

item.title: BELGIUM: strike on wednesday 22 April
item.description:
22.04.2015 00:00 - 23:59

Due to strike action on the network of SNCB, a lots of trains are cancelled.

item.title: Back to normal situation
item.description:
22.04.2015 11:54 - 23:59

The incident in Dommeldange has been solved at 12:05. Delays and cancellations may still be expected.
